title: The Social Climber's Guide to High School
description: THE ART OF THE CLIMB  Meet the Social Climber. Charming to the masses, fully intriguing, she is nothing if not unique and confident. Call her a rising star, a fashion-forward thinker, just don't mistake her for the (let's admit it) arrogant and awful It Girl. The SC is far superior. She is the girl everyone knows -- and actually admires. The girl you want to be.  But social climbing isn't easy. It starts with a serious reality check and an unlevel, highly competitive playing field: high school. You need skills to reach the peak of the high school A-list now, and making varsity cheer isn't even a start.  So step behind the velvet rope with this powerful and hilarious field guide. Unlock the secrets of popularity and personality.  Go on, embrace the Climb.
author: Robyn Schneider
